concept.title: JMS Consumer
concept.shortdesc: The JMS Consumer origin reads data from a Java Messaging Service (JMS).

conbody.p: JMS Consumer originovervieworiginsJMS ConsumerBefore you use JMS Consumer, install the drivers required for your JMS implementation.

When you configure a JMS Consumer, you configure the connection information and the queue or topic name. You can optionally use JMS credentials and remove control characters. You can also define a JMS message selector to specify the messages that the origin reads. By default, JMS Consumer reads all messages.
JMS stores the offset with the JMS server. You cannot use to reset the offset.Advanced Message Queuing Protocol (AMQP) is an alternative standard to JMS and any AMQP provider should also support JMS.
